mapper.insert: insert into fc_sellerOrder (sellerNumber, materialNumber, sellerOrderQuantity, sellerOrderStatus) values(#{sellerNumber}, #{materialNumber}, 1, '주문완료')
mapper.select: select * from fc_sellerOrder where sellerOrderCreatedAt = ( select max(sellerOrderCreatedAt) from fc_sellerOrder where sellerNumber = #{sellerNumber})
SELECT * FROM fc_sellerOrder WHERE sellerNumber = #{sellerNumber} GROUP BY sellerOrderCreatedAt ORDER BY sellerOrderCreatedAt DESC
